mapper.sql: t.fc_id_tfundinfo idFundInfo, t.fc_fundcode fundCode, t.fc_fundname fundName, t.fc_fundtype, decode(t.fc_fundtype, '01', '股票型', '02', '债券型', '03', '混合型', '04', '货币性', '08', '专户产品', '股票型') fundTypeDesc, t.fc_fundnameeng fundNameEng, t.fn_totalfundvol totalFundVol, t.fc_fundstatus fundStatus, decode(t.fc_fundstatus, '0', '可申购赎回', '1', '发行', '4', '停止申购赎回', '5', '停止申购', '6', '停止赎回', '9', '基金封闭', 'A', '基金终止', '可申购赎回') fundStatusDesc, t.fd_navdate navDate, t.fn_nav nav, t.fc_convertstatus convertStatus, t.fc_tano tano, t.fc_periodicstatus periodicStatus, t.fc_transferagencystatus tansferAgencyStatus, t.fc_currencytype currencyType, t.fc_fundsize fundSize, t.fc_defdividendmethod defDividendMethod, t.fc_custodiancode custOdianCode, t.fc_ipostartdate ipoStartDate, t.fc_ipoenddate ipoEndDate, t.fc_managercode managerCode, t.fc_fundsponsor fundSponsor, t.fn_tradingprice tradingPrice, t.fn_facevalue faceValue, t.fc_dividentdate dividentDate, t.fc_registrationdate regiStartionDate, t.fc_substype subsType, t.fn_valueline valueLine, t.fc_updatedate updateDate, t.fc_fundriskgrade fundRiskLevel, t.fc_fundriskgradedesc fundRiskLevelDesc, t.fn_feefactor feeFactor, t.fn_accumulativenav accumalativeNav, t.fn_totalincome totalIncome, t.fn_ttincome ttIncome, t.fn_incomeyield incomeYield, t.fc_dividendmodify dividendModify, t.fc_onriskprotocol onRiskProtocol, t.fc_oncontractsystem onContractSystem, t.fc_disdate disdate, t.fn_redemptionarrivectdate redemptionArrivectDate, t.fc_issubscribe isSubscribe, t.fc_isquick isQuick, t.fn_buypayperiod buypayPriod, t.fn_redemptionpayperiod redemptionPayPeriod, t.fn_conversionpayperiod conversionPayPeriod, t.fn_subpaybackperiod subpaybackPeriod, t.fn_dividendpayperiod dividendpayPeriod, t.fc_shareclass shareClass, decode(t.fc_shareclass, '0', '前收费', '1', '后收费') shareClassName, t.fc_targetfundcode targetFundCode, t.fc_agencyfeeflag agencyFeeFlag, t.fc_isguaranteedfund isGuaranteedFund, t.fc_isloffund isLofFund, t.fc_isqdiifund isqdiiFund, t.fc_isetffund isetfFund, t.fc_subscribe subscribe, t.fc_liquidation liquidation, t.fc_subscribeaffirm subscribeAffirm, t.fc_fixedinvestment fixedInvestment, t.fc_mandatoryredemption mandatoryRedemption, t.fc_isdiscount isDiscount, t.fc_expectclose expectClose, t.fc_programe_no programeNo, t.fc_chargetype chargeType, t.fn_specifyratefee specifyRateFee, t.fn_specifyfee specifyFee, t.fc_cashaccountid cashAccountid, t.fn_monthly_sales monthlySaled, t.fn_populararity populararity, t.fc_isrecommend isRecommend, t.fd_last_date lastDate, t.fc_annual_gain annualGain, t.fc_interval_t intervalT, t.fc_fundurl fundUrl from t_os_fund_info t

insert into t_os_fund_info (fc_id_tfundinfo, fc_fundcode, fc_fundname, fc_fundtype, fc_fundnameeng, fn_totalfundvol, fc_fundstatus, fd_navdate, fn_nav, fc_convertstatus, fc_tano, fc_periodicstatus, fc_transferagencystatus, fc_currencytype, fc_fundsize, fc_defdividendmethod, fc_custodiancode, fc_ipostartdate, fc_ipoenddate, fc_managercode, fc_fundsponsor, fn_tradingprice, fn_facevalue, fc_dividentdate, fc_registrationdate, fc_substype, fc_fundriskgrade, fc_fundriskgradedesc, fn_accumulativenav, fn_totalincome, fn_ttincome, fn_incomeyield, fc_dividendmodify, fc_onriskprotocol, fc_oncontractsystem, fc_disdate, fn_redemptionarrivectdate, fc_issubscribe, fc_isquick, fn_buypayperiod, fn_redemptionpayperiod, fn_conversionpayperiod, fn_subpaybackperiod, fn_dividendpayperiod, fc_shareclass, fc_targetfundcode, fc_agencyfeeflag, fc_isguaranteedfund, fc_isloffund, fc_isqdiifund, fc_isetffund, fc_subscribe, fc_liquidation, fc_subscribeaffirm, fc_fixedinvestment, fc_mandatoryredemption, fc_isdiscount, fc_expectclose, fc_chargetype, fn_specifyratefee, fn_specifyfee, fc_cashaccountid, fn_monthly_sales, fn_populararity, fc_isrecommend, fd_last_date, fc_annual_gain, fc_interval_t, fc_fundurl, fc_fcu, fd_fcd, fc_lmu, fd_lmd) values
( sys_guid(), #{item.fc_fund_code}, #{item.fc_fund_name}, #{item.fc_fund_type}, #{item.fc_fund_name_eng}, #{item.FN_TOTAL_FUND_SHARE}, #{item.fc_status}, #{item.fd_nav_date}, #{item.fn_nav}, #{item.fc_convert_status}, #{item.fc_ta_code}, #{item.fc_periodic_status}, #{item.fc_transfer_agency_status}, #{item.fc_currency_type}, #{item.FN_TOTAL_FUND_SHARE}, #{item.fc_def_dividend_method}, #{item.fc_custodian_code}, #{item.fc_start_date}, #{item.fc_end_date}, #{item.fc_fund_manager_name}, #{item.fc_fund_sponsor}, #{item.fn_trading_price}, #{item.fn_face_value}, #{item.fc_divident_date}, #{item.fc_registration_date}, #{item.fc_subs_type}, #{item.FC_RISK_LEVEL}, #{item.FC_RISK_LEVEL_desc}, #{item.fn_feefactor}, #{item.fn_accumulative_nav}, #{item.fn_fund_income}, #{item.fn_yield}, #{item.fn_fund_day_income}, #{item.fc_dividendmodify}, #{item.FC_NEED_RISK_BOOK}, #{item.FC_NEED_ELECT_CONTRACT}, #{item.fc_disdate}, #{item.fn_redemptionarrivectdate}, #{item.fc_issubscribe}, #{item.fc_isquick}, #{item.FN_BUY_DAYS}, #{item.FN_REDEEM_DAYS}, #{item.FN_CONVERSION_DAYS}, #{item.FN_SUB_BACK_DAYS}, #{item.FN_DIVIDEND_DAYS}, #{item.FC_COLLECT_FEE_TYPE}, #{item.fc_targetfundcode}, #{item.fc_agencyfeeflag}, #{item.fc_isguaranteedfund}, #{item.fc_is_lof}, #{item.fc_is_qdii}, #{item.fc_is_etf}, #{item.FN_SUB_BACK_DAYS}, #{item.fc_liquidation}, #{item.fc_subscribeaffirm}, #{item.fc_fixedinvestment}, #{item.fc_mandatoryredemption}, #{item.fc_isdiscount}, #{item.fc_expectclose}, #{item.FC_FEE_RATE_METHOD}, #{item.FN_RATE_FEE}, #{item.FN_CONSTANT_FEE}, #{item.fc_cashaccountid}, #{item.fn_monthly_sales}, #{item.fn_populararity}, #{item.fc_isrecommend}, #{item.fd_last_date}, #{item.fc_annual_gain}, #{item.fc_interval_t}, #{item.fc_fundurl}, 'system', sysdate, 'system', sysdate )
mapper.select: select where t.fc_fundtype != '8' and t.fc_disstatus = '1' order by t.fn_orderid desc
select where t.fc_fundtype != '8' and t.fc_disstatus = '1' and t.fc_fundcode = #{fundCode}

select t.fc_cashaccountid cashAccountId, t.fc_transactionaccountid tradeAccount, t.fc_branch_code brachCode, t.fc_cust_no custNo, t.fc_bank_acct bankAcct, t.fc_bank_acct_name bankAcctName, t.fc_bank_no bankNo, t.fc_capital_mode capitalMode, t.fc_main_flag mainFlag, t.fc_card_type cardType from t_os_user_bank_card t where t.fc_state = '0' and t.fc_auth_flag = '1' and t.fc_cust_no = #{custNo}
mapper.insert: insert into t_os_fund_info (fc_id_tfundinfo, fc_fundcode, fc_fundname, fc_fundtype, fc_fundnameeng, fn_totalfundvol, fc_fundstatus, fd_navdate, fn_nav, fc_convertstatus, fc_tano, fc_periodicstatus, fc_transferagencystatus, fc_currencytype, fc_fundsize, fc_defdividendmethod, fc_custodiancode, fc_ipostartdate, fc_ipoenddate, fc_managercode, fc_fundsponsor, fn_tradingprice, fn_facevalue, fc_dividentdate, fc_registrationdate, fc_substype, fc_fundriskgrade, fc_fundriskgradedesc, fn_accumulativenav, fn_totalincome, fn_ttincome, fc_onriskprotocol, fc_oncontractsystem, fn_buypayperiod, fn_redemptionpayperiod, fn_conversionpayperiod, fn_subpaybackperiod, fn_dividendpayperiod, fc_shareclass, fc_isguaranteedfund, fc_isloffund, fc_isqdiifund, fc_isetffund, fc_chargetype, fn_specifyratefee, fn_specifyfee, fc_fcu, fd_fcd, fc_lmu, fd_lmd ) values ( sys_guid(), #{FC_FUND_CODE}, #{FC_FUND_NAME}, #{FC_FUND_TYPE}, #{FC_FUND_NAME_ENG}, #{FN_TOTAL_FUND_SHARE}, #{FC_STATE}, #{FC_NAV_DATE}, #{FN_NAV}, #{FC_CONVERT_STATUS}, #{FC_TA_CODE}, #{FC_PERIODIC_STATUS}, #{FC_TRANSFER_AGENCY_STATUS}, #{FC_CURRENCY_TYPE}, #{FN_TOTAL_FUND_SHARE}, #{FC_DEF_DIVIDEND_METHOD}, #{FC_CUSTODIAN_CODE}, #{FC_START_DATE}, #{FC_END_DATE}, #{FC_FUND_MANAGER_NAME}, #{FC_FUND_SPONSOR}, #{FN_TRADING_PRICE}, #{FN_FACE_VALUE}, #{FC_DIVIDENT_DATE}, #{FC_REGISTRATION_DATE}, #{FC_SUBS_TYPE}, #{FC_RISK_LEVEL}, #{FC_RISK_LEVEL_DESC}, #{FN_ACCUMULATIVE_NAV}, #{FN_FUND_INCOME}, #{FN_FUND_INCOME}, #{FC_NEED_RISK_BOOK}, #{FC_NEED_ELECT_CONTRACT}, #{FN_BUY_DAYS}, #{FN_REDEEM_DAYS}, #{FN_CONVERSION_DAYS}, #{FN_SUB_BACK_DAYS}, #{FN_DIVIDEND_DAYS}, #{FC_COLLECT_FEE_TYPE}, #{FC_ISGUARANTEEDFUND}, #{FC_IS_LOF}, #{FC_IS_QDII}, #{FC_IS_ETF}, #{FC_FEE_RATE_METHOD}, #{FN_RATE_FEE}, #{FN_CONSTANT_FEE}, 'system', sysdate, 'system', sysdate )
